channel.title: Original Unreal Tournament
channel.description: Talk about the original Unreal Tournament, released in 1999.

item.title: Can you guess the name of the map?
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Inspired from another forum...
Dr.Flay said:
Grins don't just post more screenshots, or we may as well create another (separate) "What are these ?" thread.
Click to expand...
...and, now, here we all are.

Seeing as I'm usually on here once a day, this should work okay.

Rules:
· Only maps for the original (ut99) Unreal Tournament.
· 1 map post at a time, with a couple screenshots (no more than 3, no less than 2).
· Try to keep your guesses down to 1 or 2.
· After whoever posted the...

Can you guess the name of the map?

item.title: Dreamcast maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xan the Man)
item.dc:creator: Xan the Man
item.content:encoded: Is there any place I can download the dreamcast exclusive UT maps (ie. flux, brickyard, singularity, nebula, etc)? I looked to an extent on the map sites posted, but all I find are custom maps. I got some of the maps Im looking for from Inoxx's mappack (like Spacenoxx), but I am still missing a lot of these.

item.title: ut99.org's current 3072uu mapping contest
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
It started on October 5th and it runs until November 10th. Some maps have already been submitted, more are on the way.

Meant to share an announcement on this earlier but life got in the way.

Have a looksee · https://ut99.org/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=11751


Apologies if someone else already made the annoucement to this forum... I didn't see it.

item.title: Rules for playing ut99 online (silly version)
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Anyone that's played online has probably thought there should be some general rules for how all players should handle themselves when interacting with others. In more frustrating times, everybody's probably thought of rules that were completely innappropriate but seemed to fit your more stressed mindset.

This is the place for those rules. Please share your most ridiculous thoughts of how online play should go, number them however you like....

Rules for playing ut99 online (silly version)

item.title: Tweak UT graphics/sound to the max
item.author: invalid@example.com (madscientist327)
item.dc:creator: madscientist327
item.content:encoded:
This was created at a 1600x1200 resolution.

Hi. The purpose of this thread is to be able to make UT look and sound as best as it can. I will post my settings and people can tell me what to do in order to make it better.

UPDATE #24 - April 18, 2006

These settings are in UnrealTournament.ini in UnrealTournament\System. These setting can also be modified in game by opening up the console (press ~) and typing in "preferences" (without...

Tweak UT graphics/sound to the max

item.title: Looking for GorGor
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Different forums have different rules but generally when you edit or use parts of other people's work, most seem to like it if you credit those people in your project. Whether you agree with that or not, I do... and I've become something of a crediting whore as I edit maps.

On several of those edits I've been using the UTDMT (Unreal Tournament Deathmatch Titan) which is basically a large bot that throws boulders. The extremely foul-mouthed thing was created by GorGor... who has seemingly...

Looking for GorGor

Unreal Tournament '99 Characters Papercraft

Show your love for Unreal Tournament (1999) on your desk by building these paper Unreal Tournament characters! Build your favorite player character, you can even apply a custom skin on it! So the time has come to prove you are the best. To impress your friends and build the papercrafts!

Unreal Tournament '99 Characters Papercraft

item.title: Scoreboards suitable for Instagib
item.author: invalid@example.com (iSenSe)
item.dc:creator: iSenSe
item.content:encoded:
Hi fellow UT lovers!

Any of you know a scoreboard which is suitable for instagib, and perhaps shows accuracy ?
I got MODOSUTILSv30 and UltimateScoreboard (with Substats) but only efficiency

Thanks in advance!

item.title: map types: quantity & quality
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
How many of the following map types do you have?
AS
BT
CTF
CTF4
CTFM
DM
DOM
EAS
MA
MH
SP

Which is your favorite map?

In your opinion, which is the best map you have?
In your opinion, which is the worst map you have?

Why did you keep that map so bad if you think it's the worst?

item.title: HallOfGiants Extreme with Extras
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
My map editing skills are decent but I can only do so much with what I know now. What I knew then, back when this went down, was significantly less.

Most folks know I've got a fixation on Skaarj & the HallOfGiants maps. One of my fave of those maps was called HallOfGiantsExtreme, which is essentially red-themed and two of the standard maps of this type put end to end. Making for a much longer playing area with more tubes and more play, and given the number of redeemers on the map... extra...

HallOfGiants Extreme with Extras

item.title: Unreal Tournament music won't work after UTamp 1.80
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ironword300)
item.dc:creator: Ironword300
item.content:encoded:
I'm hoping I can get some help on restoring normal UT music behavior on my system, as it no longer works after mod UTamp got hold of it. Otherwise I'm going to have to redo three or four hours' worth of reinstalling & reconfiguring various mods & bots (models/skins) when I recopy my backup clean-install UT folder.
All UT99 users be warned: UTamp 1.80 utterly hoses your UT music. To be fair, the mod is old (vintage 2000) and it might have worked as intended w/earlier versions of UT, but now...

Unreal Tournament music won't work after UTamp 1.80

item.title: transfer old perfect UT install into new system?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ironword300)
item.dc:creator: Ironword300
item.content:encoded:
I did various searches along the lines of "transfer UT install new PC" or "old Unreal Tournament new system" and came up with nothing relevant--hoping I can get a definitive answer on this either yes or no from the gurus here.

Just had a scare. I'm trying to resolve various issues relating to Infiltration and have a number of questions going in the Inf subforum right now. The questions have been posted with largely no responses for around five days now, so hard to say if they'll get...

transfer old perfect UT install into new system?

item.title: Nali Chronicles Rationale
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ironword300)
item.dc:creator: Ironword300
item.content:encoded:
Not much going on in this thread, obviously, but I'm in a phase of life right now where I'm going to (occasionally) fire up Unreal/UT Single player again for a while (I want to go through the original campaign again, and there are a lot of custom user SP maps I never played). As I was browsing this fine Friday evening, deciding which mods I might want to consider, I came across the Nali Chronicles mod and SP campaign (see http://unrealarchives.com/nali-chronicles/ ) . Dunno if...

Nali Chronicles Rationale

item.title: A problem with Screen recorder and UT99
item.author: invalid@example.com (duzap)
item.dc:creator: duzap
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys,

I am an old Tactical Ops player which is a UT99 mod. We recently started playing it again with friends and there is one guy that we suspect he's cheating with some tweaks he has.
His brother told us that he saw him typing some console commands that he has no idea what they're doing... he usually do it so quickly, so his brother won't see what he does there.

It may sound like a funny story - it is
Anyway, his brother is willing to help us catching him and we thought about...

A problem with Screen recorder and UT99

item.title: Is it possible to get UT working with BOTH OpenAL and EAX map libraries (for DM & CTF) ??
item.author: invalid@example.com (Morpheus-2396)
item.dc:creator: Morpheus-2396
item.content:encoded:
Hello Guys,

It's been a long time since I've been active on BU, so it's pleasant for me to be back again

Last year, I got myself a gaming headphone - so I wanted to experience the power of my X-Fi in UT using CMSS-3D HP. I first tried out OpenAL (using AL-Audio render device) and then the EAX Patch (using Galaxy Audio render device).


OpenAL impression:

In order to do that, I reinstalled UT. I first installed the EAX Patch and the EAX Libraries...

Is it possible to get UT working with BOTH OpenAL and EAX map libraries (for DM & CTF) ??

item.title: CTF-FIFA on Waffnuffly-style/EXU-esque LSD
item.author: invalid@example.com (Waffnuffly)
item.dc:creator: Waffnuffly
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, EBM and I were bored in IRC, and he told me about CTF-Titania (which I had never played before) and then he told me about the Team Titans. I couldn't resist. Then EBM gave me the idea to put in all the legless Krall....

You'll just have to see it ingame to believe it! It rocks with Excessive UT. Credits to Patrick Cyr (GorGor) for the awesome titans and "TYGRA" Dmitry Gribanoff for the awesome CTF map. The combination of the two, plus a bit of my own ****age, made the most insane...

CTF-FIFA on Waffnuffly-style/EXU-esque LSD

item.title: BUF events thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNite)
item.dc:creator: NeoNite
item.content:encoded:
On a regular base, bufers will organise gaming events.
This idea was thought up by Exus tecius. (ref. ctf even thread)

Only post here with information regarding a new event.

Discussion/smack talk (you'll feel the impact of that one in a minute) will take place in the designated event thread. This thread, idea by Skillz, was made to keep everyone interested up to date. Subscribe to it (thread tools -> subscribe to thread), and when bumped you can check out if the new...

BUF events thread

item.title: VP crashes game, any ideas how to fix?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dragonlayer)
item.dc:creator: Dragonlayer
item.content:encoded:
I downloaded the Father Ted VP and assigned it to a bot, but every time the bot enters my team the game crashes with this message.

Can anyone make anything out of the error message and is it something I can fix?
